name: Barbell Bench Press
form_tips: Keep feet flat on floor, shoulder blades retracted. Lower bar to mid-chest with elbows at 45 degrees. Press up explosively.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
form_tips: Start with dumbbells at chest level. Press up until arms are extended. Lower with control, allowing greater stretch than barbell.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
form_tips: Set bench to 30-45 degrees. Keep shoulder blades retracted. Bar should touch upper chest. Great for upper chest development.

name: Push-ups
form_tips: Hands shoulder-width apart, body in straight line. Lower chest to ground, elbows at 45 degrees. Push back up to start.

name: Cable Chest Fly
form_tips: Stand between cables at chest height. Slight bend in elbows. Bring hands together in arc motion. Control the return.

name: Barbell Deadlift
form_tips: Feet hip-width, bar over mid-foot. Hinge at hips, keep back neutral. Drive through heels to stand. Lower with control.

name: Barbell Row
form_tips: Bend at hips, back flat. Pull bar to lower chest/upper abs. Keep elbows close to body. Squeeze shoulder blades together.

name: Pull-ups
form_tips: Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders. Pull until chin over bar. Full range of motion. Control the descent.

name: Lat Pulldown
form_tips: Grip bar wider than shoulders. Pull to upper chest while keeping torso upright. Squeeze shoulder blades together. Control return.

name: Dumbbell Row
form_tips: Support yourself on bench. Pull dumbbell to hip. Keep elbow close to body. Squeeze at top, control the descent.

name: Barbell Back Squat
form_tips: Bar on upper back, feet shoulder-width. Descend until thighs parallel to ground. Keep chest up, knees tracking over toes.

name: Barbell Front Squat
form_tips: Bar on front of shoulders, elbows high. Stay upright through descent. More quad emphasis than back squat. Core engagement critical.

name: Leg Press
form_tips: Feet shoulder-width on platform. Lower until 90-degree knee bend. Press through heels. Don't lock knees at top.

name: Romanian Deadlift
form_tips: Start standing. Hinge at hips, slight knee bend. Lower bar along shins. Feel hamstring stretch. Return to standing.

name: Leg Curl
form_tips: Lie face down, pad on lower calves. Curl legs toward glutes. Squeeze at top. Lower with control. Isolates hamstrings.

name: Leg Extension
form_tips: Sit with pad on lower shins. Extend legs until straight. Squeeze quads at top. Lower with control. Isolates quadriceps.

name: Walking Lunges
form_tips: Step forward, lower back knee toward ground. Front thigh parallel to ground. Push through front heel to next step.

name: Barbell Overhead Press
form_tips: Bar at shoulder height. Press overhead until arms extended. Keep core tight. Lower under control. Great for shoulder strength.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
form_tips: Dumbbells at shoulder height. Press overhead until arms extended. Can be done seated or standing. Control the descent.

name: Lateral Raise
form_tips: Arms at sides, slight bend in elbows. Raise dumbbells to shoulder height. Lead with elbows. Lower with control.

name: Face Pulls
form_tips: Cable at face height with rope. Pull toward face, splitting rope. External rotation at end. Great for rear delts and posture.

name: Barbell Bicep Curl
form_tips: Stand with bar at thighs. Curl bar toward shoulders. Keep elbows stationary. Squeeze at top. Lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
form_tips: Arms at sides. Curl dumbbells toward shoulders. Can alternate or do together. Keep elbows still. Control the negative.

name: Hammer Curl
form_tips: Neutral grip (palms facing each other). Curl dumbbells toward shoulders. Targets brachialis. Keep elbows stationary.

name: Tricep Dips
form_tips: Grip parallel bars. Lower body by bending elbows. Go until upper arms parallel to ground. Push back up to start.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
form_tips: High cable with bar or rope. Elbows at sides. Push down until arms straight. Squeeze triceps. Return with control.

name: Skull Crushers
form_tips: Lie on bench, bar above head. Lower bar toward forehead by bending elbows. Keep upper arms stationary. Extend back to start.

name: Plank
form_tips: Forearms on ground, body in straight line. Hold position. Keep core engaged, don't let hips sag. Breathe normally.

name: Crunches
form_tips: Lie on back, knees bent. Lift shoulders off ground. Focus on contracting abs, not pulling on neck. Lower with control.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
form_tips: Hang from pull-up bar. Raise legs until parallel to ground. Keep legs straight or bent at knees. Lower with control.

name: Russian Twist
form_tips: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly. Hold weight at chest. Rotate torso side to side. Keep core engaged throughout.

name: Cable Wood Chop
form_tips: Stand sideways to cable. Pull cable diagonally across body. Rotate through core. Control the return. Switch sides.

name: Farmer's Walk
form_tips: Hold heavy dumbbells at sides. Walk with good posture. Keep shoulders back and core tight. Great for grip and conditioning.

name: Burpees
form_tips: Start standing. Drop to push-up position. Perform push-up. Jump feet to hands. Explosive jump up. Full body conditioning.

name: Kettlebell Swing
form_tips: Hinge at hips, swing kettlebell between legs. Explosively extend hips to swing kettlebell to shoulder height. Power from hips, not arms.
